column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Absolutely amazing. I wish I had more time to see everything
column2: so make sure you come early. I had such a great time. I don't know if the audio commentary are worth it ($7). Very few exhibits have the added feature
column4: half of it was interesting and half of it was not too different from what is written on the side of the artwork. I don't think I would get it next time.
